Install #

npm i ssy-ui-vite

Quick Start #

import Vue from 'vue'
import SSYUI from 'ssy-ui-vite'

const App = {
  template: `
          <MyButton/>
      `,
};

createApp(App)
    .use(SmartyUI)
    .mount("#app");
